Ahmets_package

Class CombatCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ahmets_package.CombatCommand

  • public class CombatCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    Has the same fuction as the Command class, but this class is for the combat commands.

      boolean hasSecondWord()
      Returns whenever or not that the command has a second word, used in game to check if the useItem command has an item id associated with it.

      Checks if this is an unknown command.
